Articles.Content:
Except on this thread maro. Might as well have a record of it somewhere.

(oh and also this is my first post, lucky you!)
there are a lot of deadzones/deathgrass patches that cause your plane/rover to blow up when passing over, I don't know if this is an easteregg or not though.

there are a lot of deadzones/deathgrass patches that cause your plane/rover to blow up when passing over, I don't know if this is an easteregg or not though.

That's probably more of a bug than an easter egg.
Congrats, you've found a Mun Arch, the most astounding geological formation on the Mun. Which made me want to set up a Mun Base there.
there is another kerbal space centre in a valley in some snowy mountains

It would be fun if in a later version we could find a spot on the mun with that Kerbin idling around in front of a camera on a tri-pod, with the regolith-castle as well.

This, so very much!
Wat about a kerbin version of slendy??? That would be Halarius!!!!!

Wat about a kerbin version of slendy??? That would be Halarius!!!!!

it wouldn't really follow the "space" theme

Whoa, I have seen it now for the first time, but when at menu screen, (moonish one), i saw one helmet to fly in an orbit above ground!

I saw rolling it on ground before, but I havent seen that before! hapeded so fast I was just staring and not taking screens, sorry:/
True but it would be a good easter egg and funny
